Title: Abbreviation <abbr>
HTML: The WHO was founded in 1948.

Title: Anchor <a>
HTML: Visit our website

Title: Article <article>
HTML:
Today's News

Breaking News

Major development in technology today.

Sports Update

Local team wins championship.

Weather Report

Sunny skies expected this week.

Title: Blockquote <blockquote>
HTML:
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

— Franklin D. Roosevelt

Title: Button <button>
HTML:
<button class="btn-primary" type="button">Primary Button</button>
<button class="btn-secondary" type="button">Secondary</button>
<button class="btn-outline" type="button">Outline</button>

Title: Code <code>
HTML: To print a message in JavaScript, use the console.log() method.

Title: Colgroup <colgroup>
HTML:
Product Description Price Discount
Laptop 15-inch display $999 10%
Mouse Wireless $25 5%

Title: Column <col>
HTML:
Task Status Progress
Design Complete 100% 100%
Development In Progress 65% 65%
Testing Not Started 0% 0%

Title: Datalist <datalist>
HTML:
<label for="choice">Choose an option:</label>
<input list="options" id="choice" name="choice" placeholder="Type to search..." />

<datalist id="options">
  <option value="Option 1"></option>
  <option value="Option 2"></option>
  <option value="Option 3"></option>
  <option value="Option 4"></option>
  <option value="Option 5"></option>
</datalist>

Title: Deleted Text <del>
HTML: The meeting is scheduled for Tuesday Wednesday at 3 PM.

Title: Details <details>
HTML:
<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
  Something small enough to escape casual notice.
</details>

Title: Fieldset <fieldset>
HTML:
<form>
  <fieldset>
    <legend>Personal Information</legend>
    <label for="name">Name:</label>
    <input type="text" id="name" name="name" />
    <label for="email">Email:</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" name="email" />
  </fieldset>
</form>

Title: Footer <footer>
HTML:
© 2024 Company Name. All rights reserved.

Contact: info@company.com

Title: Form <form>
HTML:
Username:
Password:

Title: Header <header>
HTML:
Company Name

Home About Services Contact

Title: Header Group <hgroup>
HTML:
Annual Report 2024

Financial Overview and Key Metrics

This year has shown significant growth across all sectors. Our strategic initiatives have led to improved customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

Title: Horizontal rule <hr>
HTML:
Introduction

This is the first section of content.

Main Content

This is the second section of content.

Title: Iframe <iframe>
HTML:
<iframe
  id="mapFrame"
  title="Interactive Map"
  src="https://www.openstreetmap.org/export/embed.html?bbox=-0.004017949104309083%2C51.47612752641776%2C0.00030577182769775396%2C51.478569861898606&layer=mapnik">
</iframe>

Title: Input type text
HTML:
<label>Text:</label>
<input type="text" placeholder="Enter text" />

Title: Input type number
HTML:
<label>Number:</label>
<input type="number" min="0" max="100" placeholder="0-100" />

Title: Input type date
HTML:
<label>Date:</label>
<input type="date" />

Title: Input type time
HTML:
<label>Time:</label>
<input type="time" />

Title: Input type color
HTML:
<label>Color:</label>
<input type="color" value="#667eea" />

Title: Input type range
HTML: 50

Title: Input type file
HTML:
<label>File:</label>
<input type="file" />

Title: Input type checkbox
HTML:
<label>Checkbox:</label>
<input type="checkbox" id="check1" /> <label for="check1">Option 1</label>
<input type="checkbox" id="check2" /> <label for="check2">Option 2</label>
<input type="checkbox" id="check3" /> <label for="check3">Option 3</label>

Title: Input type radio
HTML:
<label>Radio:</label>
<input type="radio" id="radio1" name="option" value="1" /> <label for="radio1">Option 1</label>
<input type="radio" id="radio2" name="option" value="2" /> <label for="radio2">Option 2</label>
<input type="radio" id="radio3" name="option" value="3" /> <label for="radio3">Option 3</label>

Title: Input type datetime local
HTML:
<label for="meeting-time">Choose a time for your appointment:</label>

<input
  type="datetime-local"
  id="meeting-time"
  name="meeting-time"
  value="2018-06-12T19:30"
  min="2018-06-07T00:00"
  max="2018-06-14T00:00" />

Title: Input type email
HTML:
<label for="email">Enter your example.com email:</label>

<input type="email" id="email" pattern=".+@example\.com" size="30" required />

Title: Input type password
Input type search
HTML:
<label for="site-search">Search the site:</label>
<input type="search" id="site-search" name="q" />

<button>Search</button>

Title: Keyboard Input <kbd>
HTML: Press Ctrl + C to copy an element.

Title: Label <label>
HTML:
<label for="username">Username:</label>
<input type="text" id="username" name="username" />

Title: Navigation section <nav>
HTML: Home About Services Contact

Title: Option Group <optgroup>
HTML:
<label for="item-select">Choose between items in two categories:</label>
<select id="item-select">
  <optgroup label="Category 1">
    <option>Item 1</option>
    <option>Item 2</option>
    <option>Item 3</option>
  </optgroup>
  <optgroup label="Category 2">
    <option>Item 1</option>
    <option>Item 2</option>
    <option>Item 3</option>
  </optgroup>
</select>

Title: List ordered <ol>
HTML:
1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item

Title: List unordered <ul>
HTML:
• First item
  • Second item
  • Third item

Title: Progress <progress>
HTML:
<label for="file">Progress Bar:</label>

<progress id="file" max="100" value="70">70%</progress>

Title: Select <select>
HTML:
<label for="select-example">Choose an option:</label>

<select name="options" id="select-example">
  <option value="">--Please choose an option--</option>
  <option value="option1">Option 1</option>
  <option value="option2">Option 2</option>
  <option value="option3">Option 3</option>
 </select>

Title: Audio <audio>
HTML:
<audio controls>
  <source src="https://www.w3schools.com/html/horse.ogg" type="audio/ogg">
  <source src="https://www.w3schools.com/html/horse.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
  Your browser does not support the audio element.
</audio>

Title: Picture <picture>
Video <video>
HTML:
<video width="320" height="240" controls>
  <source src="https://www.w3schools.com/html/movie.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  <source src="https://www.w3schools.com/html/movie.ogg" type="video/ogg">
  Your browser does not support the video tag.
</video>

Title: Subscript <sub>
HTML: H<sub>2</sub>O is the chemical formula for water.

Title: Superscript <sup>
HTML: Einstein's famous equation: E = mc<sup>2</sup>

Title: Table <table>
HTML:
Title Row
Header Column 1 Header Column 2
Row 1 Column 1 Row 1 Column 2
Row 2 Column 1 Row 2 Column 2
Footer Row

Title: Textarea <textarea>
HTML: <textarea rows="5" cols="33" placeholder="Enter text here..."></textarea>
